General.Name: Universal Microwave Technology
General.Description: Universal Microwave Technology, Inc. designs, develops, and manufactures custom microwave/mm-wave devices, and antennas for broadband wireless communications. The company's products include diplexers and multiplexer, filters, couplers, OMT products, circulators/isolators, machinery components, antennas, remote mount kits, and waveguide components. Its products are used in Point-to-Point, Cellular, VSAT, WiMax, and LTE applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.
